Description: Fender 2011 FSR 57 Vintage Reissue Stratocaster Candy Apple RedThis guitar is exactly like the 1980's Red Strat that David Gilmour played even up through his last tour! I bought this Fender Special Run 57 Vintage Reissue in 2013. I've played a bit in studio/rehearsal, a few gigs, but it has sat mostly at home. Guitar is in fantastic shape - especially the neck. I put EMG DG20 pickups to make it like Gilmour's in within a year of buying it. I also put new strap buttons on it cause the original ones the strap kept falling off that I had. I can't find the originals strap buttons. The tremolo block and bar is a Callaham - I replaced the original one cause the bar snapped off in it as it got stuck. There is a few blemishes on this guitar but they are very minor, most of them look like natural wear since it is a Nitro Finish. Also, I installed the 5 way selector and do not have the original 3 way. The original pickups and controls were sold as well. Also the decals are not lacquered over like Fender did in the original 50's Strats. The Original Contour Body decal chipped a tiny little bit but it's not bad. It's got the standard 57 reissue 7.25" radius on the fretboard and has a soft 57 V profile. Comes with the original vintage style tweed case. Great feel on this guitar, let me know if you have questions. This guitar is amazing and it breaks my heart to let it go but I need the money. Priced to move!! Let me know if you have any questions Body: AlderBody Shape: StratocasterBody Finish: Nitrocellulose LacquerNeck Shape: "V" ShapeNumber of Frets: 21Fret Size: Vintage Style FretsPosition Inlays: Black DotFretboard Radius: 7.25" (18.41 cm)Neck Material: MapleNeck Finish: Nitrocellulose LacquerNut Width: 1.650� (42 mm)Scale Length: 25.5" (64.8 cm)Neck Plate: Vintage Style 4 BoltTruss Rod Nut: Original Vintage StyleSpecial Electronics: 5-Way Switch UpgradeHardware: ChromeBridge: American Vintage Synchronized TremoloBridge Cover/Tailpiece: Includes Chrome Bridge CoverString Nut: Synthetic BoneSwitch Tip: Aged White Switch TipTremolo Arm/Handle: American Vintage Tremolo ArmAdditional Comments: The introduction of the new American Vintage Series marks the return to original specifications with smooth rounded body radii, distinctive original neck shapes, headstock shape, dot positioning, aged plastic parts and new pickups with hand beveled magnets that replicate all of the physical and tonal aspects of the originals.Unique Features: "V" Shape Maple Neck, Vintage Styling, Synthetic Bone NutCase/Gig Bag: Vintage Tweed CaseIncluded Accessories: Vintage Tweed Case"Ash Tray" Bridge CoverControl Knobs: Aged White Plastic Knob
